articles.description: Confused about what's different between the Galaxy S21, S21 Plus and S21 Ultra? We'll clear up the confusion, spec by spec.
articles.content:
Drew Evans/CNET
Samsung's Galaxy S21 lineup includes three phones, the Galaxy S21, S21 Plus and S21 Ultra. (Here's the CNET Galaxy S21 review and Galaxy S21 Ultra review.) As the names suggest, each… [+5512 chars]
